請正確使用對應的錢包入款，否則可能造成您入款失敗。: To avoid your the deposit failure, please use the corresponding wallet to make deposits.
虛擬貨幣入款需經過區塊認證確認，可能需要數分鐘或者更久，完成時間並非由本網站決定: The virtual currency entry needs to be confirmed by several blocks and this confirmation process will take a few minutes. Please note that the completion time is not determined by our company.
實際入款遊戲幣為入款金額-手續費後之餘額進行換算。: The actual deposit is equal to game money. And the balance after the handling fee for conversion.
匯率可能隨時變動中，所有交易以本網站的匯率為準，打幣後交易期間若有變動，將以實際: The exchange rate may change at any time, all transactions are subject to the exchange rate of this website. If there is any change during the transaction period after the coin is issued, it will be allocated to the game money at the exchange rate at the time of the actual coin deposit. Hence, it is recommended that you readjust the exchange rate information before depositing to ensure that you agree to the current exchange rate before depositing.
